pages.text: If you have trouble defeating stronger enemies, you can also rank up Artifacts.$(br2)To do this, you need 2 artifacts of the same rank, set, and slot, and a lot of artifact experience items. Then you can craft an artifact of the same set/slot but one rank higher. No data or level will be transferred.
Example artifact rank up recipe. Higher rank artifact experiences can also be crafted using lower rank ones.
